feed.title: Lcbc12’s bookmark
feed.subtitle: To keep an eye on my project updates!

entry.title: Creating this site
entry.content:
I want to particularly thank Johnathan Detchart for his help before, during and after my launch as a freelancer.

If you are able to check this site, it’s 100% thanks to him, I just followed the tuto.

In short, I worked with him at ISAE Supaéro and he’s a great person and a very good developer.

This blog will contain every article I find interesting for possible projects and updates for my own projects of course.

Stay tuned if you want to know more!
entry.summary: I want to particularly thank Johnathan Detchart for his help before, during and after my launch as a freelancer.
